contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 28th day of December 2004, we GRANT the Petition for Allowance of Appeal and we REVERSE the Order of the Commonwealth Court based on our decision in Siekierda v. Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of Transportation, Bureau of Driver Licensing, 580 Pa. 259, 860 A.2d 76 (2004), 172 MAP 2002.
